summary: Makes the Blade of Woe a legitimately useful dagger.
descriptionHtml:
The Blade of Woe is a supposedly legendary, two-hundred-year-old dagger. Thus, it came as a surprise when I found that it had only a weak health absorption enchantment. This mod replaces that with a bleed damage effect and soul trap. The enchantment is zero-charge, meaning that the Blade no longer requires recharging.

Installation: Drop the .esp into your Skyrim\Data folder, enable, and play.

As a side note, this mod fixes the Blade's attack speed. It now swings as fast as all other daggers. This is also my first attempt at a mod, and I would be grateful for any information regarding bugs, glitches, compatibility errors, etc.
author: Whytesmoke
